name: Traffic Racer Driving
description:
Driving in traffic has never been easy. This game is an out class real racing in car. Let’s drive a car with furious and crazy speed. Show real racing fever to all the racing rivals by driving your express car with boosting speed. This game gives you some new super speed cars for racing

Features:
New way of highway racing.
Real city car auto racing.
New and ultimate super car collection.
Real racing and highway stunts.
Crazy features and dynamic control.
